author: chrispap95
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces the following updates:
- The `FWTracksterHitsProxyBuilder` edges visualization now displays edges that connect adjacent layers using a different color. When a single layer is selected, only incoming or outcoming edges to that specific layer are displayed.
- In `FWItemValueGetter`, tracksters will now have their values displayed in the tables.
- A new proxy called 'FWTracksterLayerssProxyBuilder' is introduced that displays the `LayerClusters` as circles. 

#### PR validation:

I have captured cmsShow displays of the new proxy [here](https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/rFbnFZPOmhdFv8v).

@rovere
title: Updates to Tracksters visualization in Fireworks
